title: Hjorundfjord
brief_description: Shows the life and tourist activities in the fjord. Scenes show the harvest on land and salmon fishing from motor boats. Commercial salmon fishing has been the activity of some families for generations. A wedding couple crosses the fjord in a boat to the strains of the Hardanger eight-stringed fiddle and tourists are seen hiking, boating and mountain climbing around the fjord.
